description: Validate and sanitize all user inputs
Use parameterized queries for database operations
Escape output and use Content Security Policy
Implement strong authentication with MFA
Enforce proper access controls and RBAC
Use modern cryptographic algorithms (AES-256, SHA-256)
Use cryptographically secure random number generators
Hash passwords with bcrypt, Argon2, or scrypt
Use secure session management with HttpOnly cookies
Implement CSRF tokens on state-changing operations
Avoid shell execution, use safe APIs
Validate and sanitize file paths
Disable external entity processing in XML parsers
Avoid deserializing untrusted data
Configure CORS policies restrictively
Set security headers (CSP, HSTS, X-Frame-Options)
Implement rate limiting on sensitive endpoints
Don't expose sensitive information in error messages
Don't log sensitive data (passwords, tokens)
Keep dependencies updated and scan for vulnerabilities
